actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the excise tax on radial tires.
short_title: Radial Tire Excise Tax Repeal Act of 1979

summary.text: Radial Tire Excise Tax Repeal Act of 1979 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt radial tires and the recapping and retreading of such tires from the excise tax on tires and tubes.

titles.title: Radial Tire Excise Tax Repeal Act of 1979
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the excise tax on radial tires.
